description:
The back-and-forth battle between Trey and Yuma reaches its climactic conclusion!  Can Yuma defeat Trey without Astral’s assistance, or will Trey triumph, leaving Yuma one Heart Piece short of making it to the finals?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gekitou no Hate! Hope Ray vs Atlanthal
The End of a Fierce Fight! Hope Ray VS Atlanthal
激闘の果て!ホープレイVSアトランタル
